definitions: the action of working the pedals of a bicycle

examples.text: I have to do some fast pedaling to get the chain to engage properly

shortDefinitions: action of working pedals of bicycle

definitions: use of the pedals of a piano, organ, etc., especially in a particular style

examples.text: Chopin gave no indications of pedaling in his manuscript

shortDefinitions: use of pedals of piano, organ, etc., especially in particular style
